title: coinrank_naomi
author: coinrank_naomi
content: We're looking for experts with a finance/crypto/tech background to write engaging articles on topics like investment, cryptocurrencies, AI, and more.Contact: contact@coinrank.ioOur Site: https://www.coinrank.io/Find us at Upwork: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~01d71b6b49ff40b102Details:1. Pay: $30+ per article(Negotiable).2. No word count limit or strict deadlines.3. Experienced writers preferred.Interested? Send us your resume and writing samples showcasing your expertise in finance, crypto, or tech.

comments.author: dessyhodin97
comments.body: I'm interested in writing for you guys
